skills.name: Ice Crampon Technique
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of this character's Max HP to a single enemy.

skills.name: Salted Camping Cans
skills.desc: Applies "Survival Response" to a single target ally and increases their Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lynx's Max HP plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color>. If the target ally is a character on the Path of Destruction or Preservation, the chance of them being attacked by enemies will greatly increase. "Survival Response" lasts for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nRestores the target's HP by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lynx's Max HP plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak></color>.

skills.name: Snowfield First Aid
skills.desc: Dispels <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> <u>debuff(s)</u> from all allies and immediately restores their respective HP by an amount equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lynx's Max HP plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color>.

skills.name: Outdoor Survival Experience
skills.desc: When using Lynx's Skill or Ultimate, applies continuous healing to the target ally for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s), restoring the target ally's HP by an amount equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lynx's Max HP plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color> at the start of each turn. If the target has "Survival Response," the continuous healing effect additionally restores HP by an amount equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Lynx's Max HP plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak></color>.

skills.name: Chocolate Energy Bar
skills.desc: After Lynx uses her Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted her Talent's continuous healing effect, lasting for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Morning of Snow Hike
eidolons.desc: When healing allies with HP equal to or lower than <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, Lynx's Outgoing Healing increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>. This effect also works on continuous healing.

eidolons.name: Noon of Portable Furnace
eidolons.desc: A target with "Survival Response" can resist debuff application for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> time(s).

eidolons.name: Afternoon of Avalanche Beacon
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Dusk of Warm Campfire
eidolons.desc: When "Survival Response" is gained, increases the target's ATK by an amount equal to <unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak> of Lynx's Max HP for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Night of Aurora Tea
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Dawn of Explorers' Chart
eidolons.desc: Additionally boosts the Max HP increasing effect of "Survival Response" by an amount equal to <unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak> of Lynx's Max HP and increases Effect RES by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Advance Surveying
skillTree.desc: After a target with "Survival Response" is hit, Lynx regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy immediately.

skillTree.name: Exploration Techniques
skillTree.desc: Increases the chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Survival in the Extreme
skillTree.desc: Extends the duration of the continuous healing effect granted by Talent for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
